hero.title: The HydraTite Facial
hero.subtitle: Achieve Hydrated, Firmer Skin with Natural Radiance
hero.description: HydraTite combines the deep exfoliation of HydraFacial with the collagen-boosting power of Exilis Elite. Address sagging jowls, loose skin, and hard-to-reach areas while enjoying immediate results and zero downtime.

treatmentInfo.results: Immediate radiance and lift after first treatment; progressive collagen-driven improvements over following weeks
treatmentInfo.price: Contact for pricing - Course of 6 treatments recommended
benefits: Painless pore extraction with HydraFacial technology
Reduces sagging in jowls, neck & under-eye areas
Suitable for face, neck, and décolletage
No downtime - immediate return to daily activities

zhCN.title: HydraTite水润紧致面部护理
zhCN.description: HydraTite结合了海菲秀的深层去角质和Exilis Elite的胶原蛋白促进功效。改善松弛的下颌、松弛的皮肤和难以触及的部位，同时享受即时效果且无需恢复时间。

zhTW.title: HydraTite水潤緊緻面部護理

ar.title: علاج الوجه هايدراتايت
ar.description: يجمع هايدراتايت بين التقشير العميق لـ HydraFacial وقوة تعزيز الكولاجين لـ Exilis Elite. عالجي ترهل الفك والجلد المترهل والمناطق التي يصعب الوصول إليها مع الاستمتاع بنتائج فورية ودون الحاجة إلى فترة نقاهة.
